M: Hello. Since I bought an air conditioner from your store, I have never changed the air filter. Q1 Should I replace it soon?
W: When did you buy it? Q2 We recommend changing the filter once a year at a minimum. If you suffer from allergies, you should change it even more often.
M: Q2 Oh, I guess I’m due for a new filter then. How can I purchase a replacement? Do you carry it there?
W: Yes, we do. Q3 All you need to tell us is the model number of your air conditioner. Do you happen to know it?

M: Oh no, I hope I can finish mine on time. I have a big project that’s due by May twentieth.
W: Well, Q3 I can send you that e-mail again. I don’t think you need to worry too much about it. The instructions are easy to follow, and it shouldn’t take you more than an hour or two to complete everything.

W: Yes, it was. I’m going to request that the company in Tokyo pay me back.

M: Hello, my name is Jordan Briggs. I’ll be getting married next week and we are looking for someone to photograph our wedding. A friend of mine showed me photographs you took and I was really impressed.
W: Thanks for calling me, Mr. Briggs. What type of photographs are you interested in exactly?
M: Well, we would want you to take photographs of everything including the guests, the food, the ceremony, and the after-party. How much would that cost?
W: Well, it could be quite expensive. In order to photograph the event that extensively, I would need to hire two or three assistants.

W-Am It's really convenient. My commute to work used to be an hour by bus, and now It’s only 25 minutes.
M-Cn Wow. You know, 37l’m a member of a local bike-riding club that takes tours on the weekends. You should join. It's a great group.

M-Au : Um. Yeah, that's fine. I'm not in a rush to get there.
W-Am : Great! Thanks for being flexible. Here's your new boarding pass. The flight departs at nine fifteen from gate D44.

W-Am : Not at the moment, but there might be later. Check in with the gate agent before you board.

answer.explanation:
Transcript:
Hello everyone, and thank you for inviting me to speak with you all in this beautiful new conference room. Our newest line of office security systems is really impressive, and I am sure it will meet your needs. We have developed four options to choose from. Let me just say that Option 1 is by far the best value because of the backup system that we offer with this package. It is not as expensive as Option 4, but don’t let that fool you. Option 1 still offers all of the security that your business could want. All of our options include state-of-the-art video surveillance. Option 4 is more expensive because we offer 365 days of archived data. After taking a tour of your facilities, I feel that this option would not be the best for your company.

question.text: Where does the talk most likely take place?
Look at the graphic. Which option does the speaker recommend?
Why is Option 4 more expensive than the others?
choices: (A) It has state of the art surveillance.
(C) It includes a one-year data archive.

answer.text: (C) It includes a one-year data archive.

answer.explanation: Welcome to WBY Radio’s weekly small business report. Our first story is about recent developments in Rider Industries, the country’s leading manufacturer of cleaning supplies. Last year Rider’s market research team found that many consumers preferred to use products that are safe for the environment. As a result, Rider introduced a line of all-natural cleaning supplies. The new line of Green products has been so successful that Rider’s sales have gone up by 19 percent. The company forecasts even greater profits after it launches a digital and print advertising campaign in September

(B) An advertising campaign will be launched.
(C) An international trade show will take place.
(D) A company-wide training program will begin.

answer.text: (B) An advertising campaign will be launched.

answer.explanation: Hello, this is Satomi Endo with this morning’s news. Q1 There was a heavy rainstorm last night that damaged some electrical lines in the Park Street area. Northern Electric Company announced that workers have been busy all night repairing the storm damage. They say the work is nearly complete, and Q2 power will be restored this morning to residents and businesses in the affected area. To report problems with electric Service outside the Park Street area, or Q3 for further information, you should contact Northern Electric company at 555-4242. Customer Service agents are available to take your call 24 hours a day.

answer.explanation: Hello, Ms. Grayson. This is Michael Cook calling from Alliance Financial Bank. It has recently come to my attention that some clients who renewed their credit card this month were sent the wrong card. We have had multiple calls from bank members saying that they were sent a credit card with someone else’s name on it. According to our records, you were also sent the wrong credit card. We ask that you please dispose of the credit card by cutting it with a pair of scissors. In the meantime, we will issue a new credit card and have it delivered by express mail. We apologize for the inconvenience.

answer.explanation: Attention, passengers. Q1&2 Welcome aboard Continental Lines, with bus service to Columbia, Charleston, and terminating in Eastport. Q2 We will reach our first destination, Columbia, in approximately 2 hours, making our time at arrival 10:30 P.M., Friday the 15th. You can learn about attractions in Columbia and all of our destinations in the travel brochure located in the seat pocket. Now sit back, relax, and enjoy the scenery!

answer.explanation: Welcome to this morning's seminar for freelance writers. Today we’ll be discussing strategies for negotiating contracts between you and your publisher. l know some people are still on their way, but another conference is scheduled to begin here at one o'clock. So let’s go over some administrative details. As you know, the parking fee was included in your registration, so I have passes for everyone. I'll come around and hand those out now. Just show it to the attendant on your way out and you won’t be charged.

question.text: Who most likely are the listeners?
What does the speaker mean when he says, "another conference is scheduled to begin here at 1:00"?
choices: (A) He wants to start the session now.
(C) A presentation will need to be canceled.
(D) The room will need to be cleaned.

answer.text: (A) He wants to start the session now.

question.text: What will the speaker distribute to the listeners?

answer.explanation: (W-Am): Attention, all employees. As most of you know, Vento Toy Company's busiest season is coming up. Starting next month, Q1 the factory will be adding a Saturday shift to the schedule in order to meet holiday demand for our toys. Q2 If you'd like to earn some extra money by working more hours, please talk with your supervisor. Q3 The new schedule will start next month, so please let us know if you're interested by the end of the week.

question.text: What will change at the company?
According to the speaker, why should listeners talk to a supervisor?
choices: (B)To find out about a training session

question.text: When will the change be made?
___ none of us were familiar with the city, Mr. Gutman drove us to the meeting.

answer.explanation: (B) Establishes a logical relationship between the two events. Choices (A) and (D) are illogical without a contrast (Although we knew the city...; We knew the city, however,...). Choice (C) would belong in a result clause (....therefore, Mr. Gutman drove...).

question.text: To participate in the Advantage Discount program, ------- the registration form on your Web site.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.

question.text: _____  the television coverage of the general election, a number of high-profile candidates were interviewed live on air.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: Every summer, Brighton store owners create unique window displays ___ an effort to attract more tourists.

answer.explanation: In an effort to = To try to

question.text: The product development team for Herbeve Cosmetics is  _____ a package redesign to try to increase sales.

answer.explanation: Choose a main verb: auxiliary verb "is" and has an active meaning

question.text: The penalties for canceling the cell phone contract early were  _____  stated in the agreement.

answer.explanation:
Need an adv 
=>Choose A

question.text: The clerk said that  _____  fifteen customers had been waiting outside the store for it to open.

answer.explanation:
roughly = approximately
=> Choose B

question.text: Agents who have not yet registered for next week’s Insurance Excellence Forum must do so  _____.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words.

question.text: Job seekers are advised to avoid discussing confidential business knowledge acquired ___ working for former employers.

answer.explanation: While = When

question.text: Mr. Albrecht’s _____ in replying to the FIR director’s e-mail demonstrated that he was highly interested in the position.

answer.explanation:
- Possessive case=> need a Noun
=>Choose A

question.text: You will find all the pencils you need___that drawer.

answer.explanation: (D) The pencils are inside, or in, the drawer. Choice (A) describes movement from one side to another. Choices (B) and (C) are extremely unlikely places to find a pencil relative to a drawer.

question.text: The Master Gardeners Club had to _____ its monthly meeting because the community center’s conference room was double-booked.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of sentence. We have a hitn that "because the community center’s conference room was double-booked."
=> Choose C

question.text: Although measures have been introduced to discourage the use of mobile telephones inside the opera house,___ effectiveness remains limited.

answer.explanation: The answer comes before a noun so we use "their".

question.text: The proposed location for the bank branch is ------- the most convenient for our customers, but also the most cost effective.

answer.explanation: In the sentence "but also", so it is possible to recognize the lack of "not only" to create a complete pair of matching words.

question.text: The lawyers report that the merger was successfully concluded  _____ last-minute negotiations.

answer.explanation: After the blank is a noun phrase => need a preposition that is reasonable in meaning.

question.text: Atlas Printing ------- can accommodate large orders within 25 hours.

answer.explanation: Noun (Atlas Printing) + adverb + verb (can accommodate)

question.text: The best method for improving the _____  of your home at little cost is giving the exterior a fresh coat of paint.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of the word to choose the correct answer
=>B

question.text: Russet Software announced in a press release that it is planning to expand ---- India.

answer.explanation: Due to after is the name of a country and the phrase "expand into"

question.text: Starting September 1, the accounting department will issue travel reimbursements  _____ from biweekly paychecks.

answer.explanation: Choose a modifier for the verb "issue".

question.text: Rising gas prices are cutting into our profits, so we ___ to look for alternative delivery methods.

answer.explanation:
Must/Should/Could do st
Need to do st

question.text: The director has requested a  _____  costs of short- and long-term agreements.

answer.explanation: a / an / the + nouns

question.text: Ms. Ling is not here today, but she  ______  attends every library board meeting.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of the word to choose the correct answer
=> B

question.text: These reports must be turned___before the end of the week.

answer.explanation: (D) “Turned in” means submitted. Choices (A), (B), and (C) cannot be used in this context.

question.text: The director says that she___to hire several new staff members next year.

answer.explanation: (B) This simple present verb agrees with the third person singular subject, “she”. Choice (A) does not agree with the subject. Choice (C) is a gerund and cannot be used as the main verb of the clause. Choice (D) is simple past tense.

question.text: The financial team ___ that the offer was rejected.

answer.explanation: (A) The sentence requires a conjugated verb and past participle. “Team” is singular. Choice (B) is plural. Choices (C) and (D) use the present participle.

question.text: Through his extensive research into acquiring language skills, Dr. Harvey Ward has proven ______ to be a leader in the field.

answer.explanation:
use reflexive pronoun to indicate Dr. Harvey Ward
=> Choose C

question.text: ___ by the product demonstration last week, the operations manager has decided to order several of Handimaid's appliances.

answer.explanation: The verb in the beginning adverbial clause will be V-ing in active voice and past participal form in passive voice.

question.text: Over the years, businesses have developed and tested various methods to measure employee  ___.

answer.explanation:
Performance = Work
The answer comes after a noun so it is a noun, as a part of a noun phrase.

question.text: The person hired must be able to adapt ------- to changes in work assignments and schedules.

answer.explanation: verb (adapt) + adverb + object (to changes in ...)

question.text: The new Boulin sports car has several ___ that distinguish it from last year's model.

answer.explanation: "Several" means that the answer is a plural noun so we choose "features".

question.text:
Charles Nave
3739 Dale Avenue
Seattle, WA 98161
Dear Mr. Nave,
This is in reply to your inquiry about discounts for regular clients. Our company ---1--- offers them, but they are not applicable in all cases. ---2---. Only headquarters has the authority to further reduce the price of your order. Therefore, we ---3--- your request to our staff there and we are waiting to hear back from them. If they provide an estimate, we will send it to you and wait for your approval. It should take just three business days to complete the order after obtaining your ----4--- to proceed. The invoice will be mailed to you separately. We appreciate your understanding.
Sincerely,
Edie Harris

answer.explanation: It describes an event that happens frequently => Use adverb "usually"

choices: (A) You should consider placing a bulk order to get a free gift.
(B) Due to an error, the discount wasn't applied to the quote we sent you.
(C) We are only permitted to offer refunds to our regular customers.
(D) The items you ordered have already been heavily marked down.

answer.text: (D) The items you ordered have already been heavily marked down.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence
Use perfect present tense
Based on the meaning of words.

question.text:
refer to the following notice.

NOTICE TO CUSTOMERS



As you all know, the property surrounding Bracht Storage is fully fenced, and all areas (1) continuously by a video surveillance system. Our meticulous cleaning practices also deter harmful pests. However, our commitment to (2) no longer stops there. As an extra precaution, Bracht now requires storage unit contents to be insured. (3) . The policy provides partial compensation for items damaged by fire, floods and other unexpected occurrences. For more comprehensive coverage, customers may opt (4) a policy from a specialised insurance carrier. A consultant can help determine which option is suitable for you.

answer.explanation: Use passive voice based on the phrase  "by a video surveillance system."

question.text:
Vander Properties


Vander Properties has been serving Houston for over 29 years. It is through our commitment to providing the highest degree of expertise market knowledge and (1) _____ are service that we recognized as an industry leader.

We specialize in (2) _____ and corporate real estate here in the Denver area. (3) _____ you are looking to buy a new home or start a new business, we are the people you should be talking with. With our office centrally located downtown, we have our eyes on the whole city.Browse our site for listing, or give US a call today (4) _____.
www.vanderproperties.com
Phone: (313) 782-9919
Address: 834 Walton St.
It is through our commitment to providing the highest degree of expertise market knowledge and (1) _____ are service that we recognized as an industry leader.

answer.explanation:
- Need 1 Adj in front of N (service) -> eliminate A, B.        

- Adj is the verb Vpp, used as an adjective:  personalized service.        

-> Select D

question.text: We specialize in (2) _____ and corporate real estate here in the Denver area.

answer.explanation: - It is talking to specialize in corporate and residential real estate. (residential) -> Choose D.

question.text: (3) _____ you are looking to buy a new home or start a new business, we are the people you should be talking with.

answer.explanation: - Whether .. ..or: expresses the choice.

question.text: Browse our site for listing, or give US a call today (4) _____.
choices: (A) Take a drive out of town and come see us today.
(C) Of course, drop-ins are always welcome.
(D) Our kitchen is open from eight to five daily.

answer.text: (C) Of course, drop-ins are always welcome.
answer.explanation: - Talking about the methods of contact: view on the web; Calling today or in person is always welcome. -> Select C.

question.text:
TO: Randy Huffington [r.huffington@megadelta.com]
FROM: Olivia Cottrell [o_cottrell@edicare.com]
SUBJECT: Machine issues
DATE: June 20
I his is my second correspondence regarding the factory equipment that ---1--- at our Denver plant recently. As I stated in my first e-mail, a factory worker said a machine was making a lot of noise and shaking ---2---. Because there was a risk of danger, we shut the machine down to prevent it from causing serious injury to any of our workers.
The machine was delivered to our plant by your company just one week ago. ---3---. Could you please send an engineer to our plant to examine the equipment? Hopefully, your technician will be able to determine why the machine failed soon after its ---4---.
We will wait for your response and anticipate that it will be speedy.
Sincerely,
Olivia Cottrell
Senior administrator
Edicare Industrials

answer.explanation: In the blank, you need to fill in the main verb, that replaces equipment, the thing happened recently (recently) => choose D (the simple past tense)
Adverb "violently" added meaning to the word shaking

choices: (A) We have decided to return the machine at your expense.
(B) However, fixing the machine may require more time.
(C) Therefore, the equipment we purchased is still under warranty.
(D) (t was already repaired at least once in the past year.

answer.text: (C) Therefore, the equipment we purchased is still under warranty.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous sentence "The machine was delivered to our plant by your company just one week ago."
Based on the meaning of words.

question.text:
Fosberg Pharmaceutical Corporation

Fosberg Pharmaceutical Corporation covers business-related travel expenses when employees travel for the company. Lodging-arrangement requests should be submitted to the Corporate Travel Department via the online travel request form. Requests must include the employee's full name, the hotel name and contact information, the reservation dates, and the purpose for travel.
Once the Corporate Travel Department has made reservations and payment, the employee will receive a confirmation number to present to the hotel clerk upon check-in. The room will be paid for in advance, but the employees should be prepared to put any additional charges incurred during the trip on a personal credit card. Requests for reimbursement of additional charges should be submitted upon return.
What is the policy about?

Requests must include the employee's full name, the hotel name and contact information, the reservation dates, and the purpose for travel."

answer.explanation: Information in sentence: "Once the Corporate Travel Department has made reservations and payment, the employee will receive a confirmation number to present to the hotel clerk upon check-in."

question.text:
Your Online Job Finder

Work for the best!

Other companies ask their salespeople to make countless calls to potential customers who are not expecting to be contacted. At AJQ Insurance, customers call us for their insurance needs! Our insurance sales associates take only inbound sales calls from interested potential policyholders. These positions are free from the pressure of selling on commission.
Complete our sales training while being paid a generous hourly rate. Take the exam to become a licensed insurance professional. If you succeed, you may be offered a salaried position.
We will consider education and experience in the salary offer. Some university work is useful' but motivated high school graduates will also be considered. Because we work with our customers twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week, we offer many shifts to choose from—with an additional 10% in pay for late-night and early-morning shifts.
Please click Apply Now ’ below to take advantage of this opportunity with youronlinejobfinder.com. You will need an active e-mail address and phone number to complete the process. Suitable candidates wil1 be contacted by phone or e-mail. Call 409-555-0123 if you have any questions about the application process. We recommend that you become familiar with the company before applying by visiting our Web site at AJQinsurance.com.
What duty is mentioned as part of the job?
choices: (D) Calling people who are unfamiliar with the company

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: ”d. At AJQ Insurance, customers call us for their insurance needs! Our insurance sales associates take only inbound sales calls from interested potential policyholders.”

answer.explanation: The information is in: ”Take the exam to become a licensed insurance professional. If you succeed, you may be offered a salaried position.”

(C) To ask questions about the process
(D) To find out about their application status

answer.explanation: You can find the information at: ”We recommend that you become familiar with the company before applying by visiting our Web site at AJQinsurance.com.”

question.text:
Thank you for choosing Passages Hotel, Kuala Lumpur’s premier hotel and conference center. We greatly value your opinion. Please take a moment to fill out the questionnaire and either leave it in your room or place it in the box located in the hotel’s lobby.

Rate the following Excellent Good Fair Poor Not Used
Front desk service X
Concierge service X
Lotus restaurant X
Room service X
Housekeeping X
Business center X
Overall appearance of hotel X


I have stayed at this hotel a number of times on business and am usually very satisfied. However, this time it seemed that the front desk was understaffed the entire time I stayed here. I had to wait for 20 minutes to check in, and it took over 30 minutes to check out. In addition, it was difficult to contact the front desk from my room. Twice the phone rang without anyone picking up, I realize this was a busy month for the hotel, but enough staff should have been put on duty to accommodate quests.

Name (optional) : Bindi Shah
Contact information (optional): bshah@svpnet.com
Date of stay: April 15-18
What Is NOT indicated about Passages Hotel?
choices: (C) It seeks the opinions of its customers.

answer.explanation:
Thank you for choosing Passages Hotel, Kuala Lumpur’s premier hotel and conference center. → Eliminate A
We greatly value your opinion. Please take a moment to fill out the questionnaire → Eliminate C
I have stayed at this hotel a number of times on business and am usually very satisfied. However, this time it seemed that the front desk was understaffed the entire time I stayed here. I had to wait for 20 minutes to check in, and it took over 30 minutes to check out. → Eliminate D

question.text: What did Ms. Shah find unsatisfactory?

answer.explanation: Information in the sentence: "In addition, it was difficult to contact the front desk from my room."

question.text: What is suggested about Ms. Shah?
choices: (A) She was in Kuala Lumpur on business.
(B) She stayed at Passages Hotel for the first time in April.
(C) She was unhappy with the housekeeping service.
(D) She received a discount because of the hotel's poor service.

answer.text: (A) She was in Kuala Lumpur on business.
answer.explanation: Information in the sentence: "I have stayed at this hotel a number of times on business"

question.text:
Lisa Hancock   9:39
I'm stopping by a coffee shop on my way to work. What does everyone want? It's on me.

Nick Morton   9:39
Wow thanks! I'll have just black coffee.

Lilly Smith   9:40
Thanks. I'd like a latte. Can you also bring some sugar?

Lisa Hancock   9:41
Sure, I'll bring a couple of the sugar packets.

Richard Park   9:42
I can never turn down coffee. I'll also have a latte with some sugar.

Emily Jordan   9:42
I'd like a herbal tea if they have any. I don't drink anything caffeinated so any tea without caffeine would be great. Thanks.

Lisa Hancock   9:43
Alright then. I'll be there in about 20 minutes with your drinks. See you soon. Oh and before I forget, please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients.

Richard Park   9:44
The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing.

Lisa Hancock   9:45
What do you mean?

Nick Morton   9:45
We're trying to locate the package. We contacted Chantelle and they sent it to the wrong address.

Lisa Hancock   9:46
That's a disaster. Please try to find out where those dresses went.

Richard Park   9:47
Good news. I just got a message from the shipping company and they found the Chantelle order. They're redirecting the shipment to US.

Lisa Hancock   9:48
I almost had a panic attack. When will it get here?

Richard Park   9:48
This afternoon.
What type of business do the participants probably work at?

answer.explanation: Based on the conversation about work: <i>"..please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients.", "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing.", "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing."

question.text: At 9:39, what does Lisa Hancock mean when she says, “It’s on me”?
choices: (D) It’s her turn to get drinks.

answer.explanation: be on sb: used when saying who is responsible for something.

question.text: What is indicated about one of their shipments?
choices: (B) It was returned to the boutique.
(C) It will arrive later in the day.

answer.text: (C) It will arrive later in the day.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "The boxes arrived this morning and our interns are working on unpacking them now. However, the order from Chantelle seems to have gone missing."; "We're trying to locate the package. We contacted Chantelle and they sent it to the wrong address."

question.text: What kind of business is Chantelle?

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Oh and before I forget, please make sure that our orders from Cindy's Boutique get set up in our showroom for our clients."

question.text:
Dear Jean.

I wanted to write you a note to thank you. I am sorry that you felt disappointed that your work responsibilities were not what you expected. I have enjoyed having your assistance with my projects.

Although the tasks we handled were not as varied as you would have liked, just think about what you and I have accomplished since September. We organized the annual small business conference, updated the association's Web site, and answered scores of inquiries, many in great detail, from business owners who needed advice on a range of topics: loans, benefits, licensing, etc.

I feel the year has been very productive for both of us. You've been a congenial and conscientious assistant and all of us have the highest regard for your abilities. Please feel free to call upon for a recommendation if you require one for future employment.

Best of luck,
Thomas
What can be inferred about Jean?
choices: (A) She was unhappy in her job.

answer.text: (A) She was unhappy in her job.
answer.explanation: Information can be inferred from "I am sorry that you felt disappointed that your work responsibilities were not what you expected."

question.text: What is NOT cited as part of Jean's work?

answer.explanation: "We organized the annual small business conference, updated the association's web site, and answered scores of inquiries, many in great detail, from business owners who needed advice on a range of topics: loans, benefits, licensing, etc." => Eliminate A, C & D

question.text: What does Thomas say about Jean?

answer.explanation: Information in the sentence: "I feel the year has been very productive for both of us. You've been a congenial and conscientious assistant and all of us have the highest regard for your abilities."

question.text: What does Thomas offer to do for Jean?

answer.explanation: Information in the sentence: "Please feel free to call upon for a recommendation if you require one for future employment."

Jake, has order #9829-2 been sent out yet? If not, the customer has asked us to add item #645A.

question.text:
Blooming Flower Yoga Studio

Summer Yoga Classes:
This summer we will be offering a variety of summer yoga classes for all age groups and skill levels.

Summer Class Schedule and Prices (registration fee):
Beginner class, twice a week for two months ($150)
Intermediate and advanced class, twice a week for two months ($200)
Yoga for senior citizens, once a week for two months ($100)
Hot power yoga, three times a week for two months ($250)

All necessary supplies will be provided by the Blooming FlowerYoga Studio. Members should wear comfortable clothes that allow for free movement.

45 Clark Street
Indianapolis, IN 46202
715-555-5832
www.bloomingfloweryoga.com

===========================

To: Tammy Glenn - tammyglenn@mxmail.com
From: Dwayne Moore - dwaynemoore@bloomingfloweryoga.com
Date: May 23
Subject: New Student
Attachment: New member form

Dear Ms. Glenn,
I’m writing to let you know that you have one more student who has signed up for your class. Your new student is Jane Meyers and she will bring the $100 registration fee with her to the first class on Monday.
Also, on Monday, please give Ms. Meyers and any other new members the form they will need to fill out. I have attached the necessary paperwork to this e-mail. All you have to do is to print out copies and hand them out.
Your class now has nine members that will attend and is, therefore, almost at full capacity. In fact, all of the classes this summer have proved very popular, and I anticipate they will all fill up by the end of the month. Thank you so much for your many years of hard work as a teacher here at Blooming Flower Yoga studio. If you have any questions, let me know.

Dwayne Moore
What is stated about the summer classes?
choices: (C) They are available to both children and adults.
(D) They are being offered at a discounted price.

answer.text: (C) They are available to both children and adults.
answer.explanation: Information is at the phrase "This summer we will be offering a variety of summer yoga classes for all age groups and skill levels."

question.text: What is indicated about Ms. Glenn?
choices: (D) She will be receiving a pay raise.

answer.explanation: The information is in the sentence “Thank you so much for your many years of hard work as a teacher here at Blooming Flower Yoga Studio ”

answer.explanation: Information contained in sentence “'I have attached the necessary paperwork to this e-mail. All you have to do is to print out copies and hand them out.

(C) She wants to become a yoga instructor.

answer.explanation: In the email, it says that Ms. Meyers will bring in $ 100 in the beginning. Again in the advertisement, the only class that costs $ 100 is the senior class

question.text:
Tech Life Hires New CEO

New York, April 12 — Amid a crisis of low sales and disappointing performance, the technology company Tech Life has hired Steve Cross as its new chief executive officer. Previously, he was the chief financial officer at the technology investment firm Esta Resources in San Francisco, California. He assumed the position of CEO at the company—based in Dallas, Texas—just this Monday. Stockholders voted unanimously for the appointment, hoping the new CEO will bring renewed vitality and strength to the company. Mr. Cross has an impressive record as a business leader who makes smart decisions," commented Lynn Dyer, the director of human resources at Tech Life. "We have faith that he will lead US in a new direction that will help develop new markets and optimize our company operations in general."
Steve Cross graduated from Chester University in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, with a master's degree in business administration. He once served as head of the American League of Business Leaders and is a dedicated family man.

===========================

To:Steve Cross- scross@techlife.com
From:Lynn Dyer - ldyer@techlife.com
Subject: Welcome!
Date:April 15
Dear Mr. Cross,

It has been almost two years since we met. I am so glad to be collaborating with you again after we worked in the same department at Esta Resources. I felt we cooperated very well at that time, and I had been hoping to work with you again. You will find that we have very dedicated and hard-working teams here. If there is anything I can do to help you make the transition, please don’t hesitate to ask.
Additionally, Tech Life has recently added five new managers to our company. If you have time, please visit them when they will all be attending a mandatory training session at 3:00 RM. this afternoon in Room 403.

Sincerely,
Lynn Dyer
Director of Human Resources Tech Life
What problem is Tech Life facing?

answer.explanation: “Amid a crisis of low sales and disappointing performance ”

question.text: What is mentioned about the shareholders?
choices: (A) They are allowed to share financial information.
(B) They will hold a meeting next week.
(D) They agreed on the appointment of a new leader.

answer.text: (D) They agreed on the appointment of a new leader.
answer.explanation: “Stockholders voted unanimously for the appointment, hoping the new CEO will bring renewed vitality and strength to the company”

question.text: In the article, the word “optimize” in paragraph 2, line 6, is closest in meaning to

answer.explanation: End of paragraph 2: "... optimize our company operations in general"

question.text: Where did Ms. Dyer work previously?

answer.explanation:
* In the article: he (Steve Cross) was the chief financial officer at... Esta Resources in San Francisco, California.
Steve Cross is CFO at... Esta Resources in San Francisco, California.

In the email: we worked in the same department at Esta Resources CFO at... Esta Resources in San Francisco, California.

question.text: What is Mr. Cross asked to do?

answer.explanation: In the email, paragraph 2: If you have time, please visit them (new managers) when they will all be attending a mandatory training session at 3:00 PM...

question.text:
From:Henry Choi - henrychoi@neatsolutions.com
To: Jenny Davis - jennydavis@tmgolf.com
Date: August 8
Subject: Endless Acres Golf Club
Attachment: draft

Dear Ms. Davis,
Attached is the newest draft of the advertisement for Endless Acres Golf Club. I have incorporated the advertising slogan you sent me into my design. I used a combination of eye-catching graphics to grab the attention of newspaper readers. I also added some helpful information to the end of the advertisement. Please let me know if the design and new additions meet your expectations. Along with the concurrent television ad, I think this advertisement will help bring a lot of new customers to Endless Acres Golf Club.
Sincerely,
Henry Choi

==========================

Endless Acres Golf Club

1232 Hilly Meadows Drive, Mapleview, CO

Take a break from all the stress of life and play a round of relaxing golf at Endless Acres Golf Club. After a game of golf, enjoy a meal at our restaurant in a sophisticated and welcoming environment.
We are currently offering the following promotion:
Reserve a tee time for a party of seven or more golfers and receive 20% off. Additionally, every member of your group will receive a coupon for $5 off any purchase from our golf shop.
We were recently praised by The Rolling Meadows Daily for the superb maintenance of our golf course and grounds. Come in and enjoy the best golf course in the state of Colorado. We are located off exit 21 on Highway 5. Just look for our billboard. You can't miss it!
Reservations can now be made online at our website at www.endlessacresgolf. com or by calling 555-4834.

===========================

From: Logan Mankins - lmankins@crushing.com
To: reservations@endlessacresgolfclub.com
Date: July 6
Subject: Re: Tee Time and Dinner for 10

Hello,
I saw your ad in the newspaper and I have a couple quick questions about your deals. First, we have a group of ten golfers. Now I know most courses generally limit a group to four players to keep up the pace of play, but I was really hoping you could make an exception for us and allow two groups of five. We will even rent golf carts to ensure that we don’t cause a delay. As for the $5 gift cards to the pro shop, I was wondering if they could be pooled together for one large purchase. It is my son’s birthday and I would like to buy him a new putter and they are awfully expensive these days. $50 bucks could go a long way to giving him a great gift!
We would like to tee off around 11:30 A.M. on Saturday, July 20th, and then have dinner there at about 6:00 P.M. Please write back to confirm our tee time and answer my queries. Thank you for your time!
Have a great day,
Logan Mankins
What has been added to the advertisement?

answer.explanation:
In the first email, there is write “I also added some helpful information to the end of the advertisement.”
“Reservations can now be made online at our website at www.endlessacresgolf. com or by calling 555-4834.

question.text: How does Logan Mankins propose to keep his two groups of 5 golfers from delaying the other golfers on the course?
choices: (A) He guarantees they will play fast.
(B) He promises that they are very good at golf.
(C) He writes that he will buy a new putter for his son.
(D) He informs the club that the two groups will be driving golf carts.

answer.text: (D) He informs the club that the two groups will be driving golf carts.
answer.explanation: Information: “We will rent golf cart to ensure that we don't cause a delay”

question.text: What did The Rolling Meadows Daily indicate about Endless Acres Golf Club?
choices: (D) The restaurant updates its menu regularly.

answer.explanation: The information is located at the beginning of paragraph 3 of the article “We were recently praised by The Rolling Meadows Daily for the superb maintenance Of our golf course and grounds”

question.text: What does Logan Mankins want to do with the $5 credit the members get for the golf shop?
choices: (A) He wants to buy his son a putter with his.
(B) He wants to use them to pay for green fees.
(C) He wants to combine it with the 20% group discount.
(D) He wants to combine all of the discounts together and apply it to one purchase.

answer.text: (D) He wants to combine all of the discounts together and apply it to one purchase.
answer.explanation: The information is in the sentence "About the $ 5 voucher at the store, I wonder if they can be combined for one big purchase."

question.text: Where would the advertisement most likely appear?

answer.explanation: You can infer from the first sentence of the email "I see your ad on the newspaper"

question.text:
From: Stacey Watkins (staceywatkins@titus.com)
To: Ann Rose (annrose@putkincomp.com)
Subject: Conference of Bank Managers
Date: February 12

Dear Ms. Rose,
You recently contacted US about using our conference center again this year to host your Annual Conference of Bank Managers. This year we have updated our conference room with new projectors and more comfortable seating. We will be providing shuttle busses from the airport and a premium buffet in the dining hall as well as an Internet café where guests can use computers or print documents at no cost. For your convenience, we will also be providing useful supplies such as flip charts, 10-foot whiteboards, and projector screens.
Once you decide on a date, we ask that you please make a down payment of $1,000 after we see if it is available. The remaining balance should be paid upon your arrival. Also, we ask that as the organizer of the event, you arrive at the conference center a day before the conference begins. This way, any unforeseen circumstances can be taken care of beforehand.
We appreciate your business with the Titus Conference Center again. We are looking forward to providing you with the best service possible.

Stacey Watkins,
Director

===========================

From:Ann Rose (annrose@putkincomp.com)
To: Stacey Watkins (staceywatkins@titus.com)
Subject: RE: Conference of Bank Managers
Date: February 16

Dear Mr. Watkins,
I am also pleased to be working with you again this year. We would like to reserve your conference space for the weekend of August 15 to 16. Additionally, the down payment will be handled by our financial department. I will have one of the employees contact you soon.
There is one thing that I would like to tell you. Actually, last year, some of our attendees were disappointed because the dining hall didn’t offer a variety of vegetarian options. I hope this inconvenience will be dealt with in advance this year.

Thank you,
Ann Rose
Organizer, Annual Conference of Bank Managers
What does Ms. Rose suggest about the Titus Conference Center?
choices: (A) It will be their first time working together.
(C) It has several locations in the country.
(D) It failed to satisfy some guests last year.

answer.text: (D) It failed to satisfy some guests last year.
answer.explanation: The information in the second sentence near the end of the second email "Actually, last year, some of our attendees were disappointed because the dining hall didn't offer a variety of vegetarian options"

question.text: What is indicated about the Titus Conference Center?
choices: (B) It demands full payment at the time of reservation.
(C) It is located next to an international airport.
(D) It currently has no vacancies for the month.

answer.explanation: Information is in the second sentence of the first email “This year we have updated our conference room with new projectors and more comfortable seating”

question.text: When will Ms. Rose most likely arrive at the Titus Conference Center?

answer.explanation: On 2nd email, Ms. Rose wrote that “We would like to reserve your conference space for the weekend of August 15 to 16”. However, in the first email it was stated that “we are asking that, as the organizer of the event, you must come to the convention center one day before the conference begins. “

question.text: What is NOT mentioned as a benefit of using the Titus Conference Center?

answer.explanation: Third sentence in email the first said “We will be providing shuttle busses from the airport and a premium buffet in the dining hall”. That way they will provide only one meal, not multiple meals.

question.text: What is the main purpose of the second e-mail?
choices: (A) To reserve tickets for an upcoming conference
(B) To request help in making a payment

answer.explanation: The second email is from Ms. Rose, which confirms the date of the reservation at the center and provides information about the payment. So the main purpose of this email is to confirm the reservation of the Titus Convention Center accommodation.

question.text:
To: Jake Baldwin - baldwinj@technet.com
From: Dream Oasis Hotel - booking@dreamoasishotel.com
Date: September 22
Subject: Your Reservation
Attachment: invoice.html

Dear Mr. Baldwin,

Thank you for reserving a room at the Dream Oasis Hotel. You have booked a room with a double bed for the nights of October 13 and 14. Your reservation number is 5259.
I am writing to inform you that you must pay your balance by September 29 in order to confirm your reservation. Your total room fee is $165.25 for both nights. Payment can be made via credit card by visiting ourwebsite at www.dreamoasishotel.com and entering your reservation number. You may also call US and complete your payment over the phone. If payment is not received by September 29, your reservation will be canceled automatically. Please see the attached invoice for related details.
When you arrive at the airport, the easiest way to travel to our hotel is by subway. We are located next to exit 3 at City Hall Station. If you have trouble finding US, please don't hesitate to call US at 555-2134. A staff member is available 24 hours a day to assist you.

Thank you again for choosing our hotel,
Amy Lee
Customer Service Manager
Dream Oasis Hotel

======================================

To: Dream Oasis Hotel - booking@dreamoasishotel.com
From: Jake Baldwin - baldwinj@technet.com
Date:September 23
Subject: RE: Your Reservation

Dear Ms. Lee,
I am writing in regard to my reservation at the Dream Oasis Hotel for October 13 and 14.1 received your e-mail about the payment for my upcoming stay at the hotel. However, I would like to inquire about extending my stay for an extra night. I recently heard that there will be a local food festival held on October 16 and I would like to attend it. Therefore, I would like to stay at your hotel until October 15. Please let me know a revised room fee so that I can make the correct payment as soon as possible.

Jake Baldwin

===================================

To: Jake Baldwin - baldwinj@technet.com
From: Amy Lee - alee@dreamoasishotel.com
Date: September 24
Subject: The 15th
Dear Mr. Baldwin,

You are right to be excited about the food festival that will be held on the October 16th. Unfortunately, this event has become so popular that the city fills up for that weekend. I regret to inform you that there is no vacancy at the Dream Oasis Hotel for the night of the 15th. I went ahead and looked into some of our partner hotels in the area, but those properties also are at full occupancy I do hope you are able to find someplace to stay in the city so you can enjoy the festival while you are in town; I just wish it could have been with us. You could try the Executive Inn in Fairview; it is a large hotel and they do have vacancies.

Sincere apologies,
Amy Lee
Customer Service Manager
Dream Oasis Hotel
What is the purpose of the first e-mail?

answer.explanation:
- The first sentence, paragraph 2:

I am writing to inform you that you must pay your balance by September 29 in order to confirm your reservation. 
=> choose answer B

question.text: What is Mr. Baldwin asked to provide when making a payment online?

answer.explanation:
- The third verse of paragraph 2 email first:

Payment can be made via credit card by visiting our website at www.dreamoasishotel.com and entering your reservation number.

question.text: What information is NOT included in Ms. Lee’s e-mail?

answer.explanation:
Read the entire second e-mail

=> Mrs. Lee never mentioned travel insurance

=> choose answer B

question.text: Why can’t Mr. Baldwin stay at the Dream Oasis Hotel on the night of the 15th?
choices: (A) The hotel is full because of the food festival.
(B) The hotel is full because it is very popular.
(C) The hotel is full because there is a convention in town.
(D) The hotel is full because the food at the hotel is very good.

answer.text: (A) The hotel is full because of the food festival.
answer.explanation:
- The first paragraph of the second e-mail:

You are right to be excited about the food festival that will be held on the October 16th. Unfortunately, this event has become so popular that the city fills up for that weekend. I regret to inform you that there is no vacancy at the Dream Oasis Hotel for the night of the 15th.

question.text: What does Amy Lee recommend?
choices: (A) That Mr. Baldwin try another hotel in town
(B) That Mr. Baldwin try a hotel in Fairview
(C) That Mr. Baldwin try to attend the food festival next year
(D) That Mr. Baldwin ask again on the 14th, in case there is a cancellation

answer.text: (B) That Mr. Baldwin try a hotel in Fairview
answer.explanation: - The last sentence by e-mail: "You could try the Executive Inn in Fairview; it is large hotel and they do have vacancies".
